Definition.WordDefinition: Griffith, IN (town, FIPS 30042) Location: 41.52237 N, 87.42372 W Population (1990): 17916 (6914 housing units) Area: 22.6 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 46319
Griffith n : United States film maker who was the first to use flashbacks and fade-outs (1875-1948) [syn: {D. W. Griffith}, {David Lewelyn Wark Griffith}]
